choiceState.description: A Choice state adds branching logic to a state machine.

Choices.description: An array of Choice Rules that determines which state the state machine transitions to next.

Default.description: The name of the state to transition to if none of the Choice Rules match.

variable.description: A reference path specifying the input value to apply the comparison operator to.

next.description: The state to transition to if there is an exact match between the input value and the comparison operator for this Choice Rule.
